name: Manerium
description:
A really short horror themed RPG made for the GMTK Game jam 2022.

You just entered a haunted mansion and it is the last mistake you will ever make.

You have to pick between 3 actions, some have higher odds than others. And some can raise the odds of other choice. Some can end a situation faster but you'll need to get lucky.

                                 Fullscreen strongly advised.

  • "That was close but " means you were 1 unit away from the success roll value.
  • "You put on a lot of effort but it's not enough. " means you were between 4 and 1 unit away from the success roll value.
  • "You gave your best shot but it's far from enough. ") means you were 5 or more unit away from the success roll value.
